title: 关于科技类mod翻译
author: 拉结尔之书
txt_content: 原文中有一段Water logging support.    请问是什么意思

replies.author: 拉结尔之书
replies.txt_content:
xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-29 11:28
所以有上下文吗
Energy Storage (Energy Cell, Ender Network)
Ender Network (Ender Cell, Ender, Gate)
Generators (Furnator, Magmatic Generator, Thermoelectric Generator, Solar panel, Reactors)
Other Machines (Discharger, Energy Hopper, Player Transmitter)
Server Friendly Energy Cables.
Water logging support.
And more ...

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 EmptyLava 于 2020-3-29 12:04 编辑 

未充能的?
参考了waterlogging(内涝)和虚无的Reefer (Waterlogged)
我觉得跟上下文也说得通吧

机翻是水记录支持

replies.author: 庆贺怪
replies.txt_content: 能源储存(电池，Ender网络)Ender网络(Ender Cell，Ender，Gate)发电机(火炉，岩浆发电机，热电发电机，太阳能电池板，反应堆)其他机器(放电器，能量漏斗，播放器发射机)服务器友好的能源电缆。积水支援。还有更多..。

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: 全天下最帅
replies.txt_content: 根据上下文推断那个应该是水利发电机吧
